title: Surviving the mad scramble when you realise Halloween has creeped up on you
text:
SINGAPORE – There are some people who are die-hard (pun intended!) horror fanatics and there are some who can’t even stomach the sight of the tackiest House of Horrors promotional poster. Which one are you?

If you’re one of the latter and still can’t find it in you to turn down a party invite, then you know you’re repeating old patterns of scrambling for an outfit at the last minute.

READ MORE:

The noise cancelling earphones and headphones you need to bring you into 2020

Shop the S$115 shoes Meghan, Kate and Pippa can’t stop wearing

Must-have travel essentials for the savvy jet setter

Smart hacks for the home with space constraints

If you are a parent that’s stuck at this desolate juncture with - gasp - a looming Halloween party and no outfit or inspiration in sight, then we empathise. Life on this fast-paced, dog-eat-dog island can get us when we least expect it… like a kid in full meltdown mode, when he can’t join his friends trick-or-treating.

Halloween is just a week away, and you don’t have your costume just yet? FEAR NOT. If you feel like there’s a creeping presence behind you, don’t look. It’s because we’ve got your back.

Can’t go wrong with super heroes and characters!

Batman for kids More

Superman for kids. (PHOTO: Shopee) More

description: Halloween is just a week away, and you don’t have your costume just yet?
